name: Five Nightmare Nights 4
description:
CHAPTER ONE: a year after james frods finished his work in (red restaurant) in 2000 he started to have nightmares in which in 1996 he was given a new job in which he had to work 2 nights in (fazbear restaurant) and once he survived the 2 nights james realizes that everything that happened was not real and it was just a nightmare

CHAPTER TWO: one night james had 2 dreams in the first one he started to see foxy with lost eyes and a negative version of puppet with green tears and cheeks and blue lips and his second dream he was in a dead end corridor and the only thing what could I do was walk on the way when william started to follow him so james ran so he would not catch him but unfortunately william catches james and he gets a halucination of the clone of shadow freddy which also gave tommy nightmares when this term every night this animatronic was named (doppelganger)

press F5 to save the game and F6 to load the game
